info.title: HybridNetworkManagementClient
info.description: The resources in this swagger specification will be used by vendors to on-board offerings and manage vendor virtual network function.

get.description: Gets information about the specified vendor virtual network function.

parameters.name: locationName
parameters.description: The Azure region where the virtual network function sub resource was created by the customer.

parameters.name: vendorName
parameters.description: The name of the vendor.

parameters.name: serviceKey
parameters.description: The GUID for the vendor virtual network function.

200.description: Request is successful. The operation returns the resulting vendor virtual network function sub resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Creates or updates a vendor virtual network function.

parameters.name: locationName
parameters.description: The Azure region where the virtual network function resource was created by the customer.

parameters.name: vendorName
parameters.description: The name of the vendor.

parameters.name: serviceKey
parameters.description: The GUID for the vendor virtual network function.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update vendor virtual network function operation.

200.description: Creation or update is successful. The operation returns the resulting vendor virtual network function sub resource.

201.description: Created. The operation returns the resulting vendor virtual network function sub resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Starts a role instance of a vendor virtual network function.

parameters.name: locationName
parameters.description: The Azure region where the virtual network function resource was created by customer.

parameters.name: vendorName
parameters.description: The name of the vendor.

parameters.name: serviceKey
parameters.description: The GUID for the vendor virtual network function.

parameters.name: roleInstanceName
parameters.description: The name of the role instance of the vendor virtual network function.

202.description: Accepted. The header contains 'Azure-AsyncOperation' header which can be used to monitor the progress of the operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Powers off (stop) a role instance of a vendor virtual network function.

parameters.name: locationName
parameters.description: The Azure region where the virtual network function resource was created by customer.

parameters.name: vendorName
parameters.description: The name of the vendor.

parameters.name: serviceKey
parameters.description: The GUID for the vendor virtual network function.

parameters.name: roleInstanceName
parameters.description: The name of the role instance of the vendor virtual network function.

202.description: Accepted. The header contains 'Azure-AsyncOperation' header which can be used to monitor the progress of the operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Restarts a role instance of a vendor virtual network function.

parameters.name: locationName
parameters.description: The Azure region where the virtual network function resource was created by customer.

parameters.name: vendorName
parameters.description: The name of the vendor.

parameters.name: serviceKey
parameters.description: The GUID for the vendor virtual network function.

parameters.name: roleInstanceName
parameters.description: The name of the role instance of the vendor virtual network function.

202.description: Accepted. The header contains 'Azure-AsyncOperation' header which can be used to monitor the progress of the operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Gets the operational state of role instances of a vendor virtual network function.

parameters.name: locationName
parameters.description: The Azure region where the virtual network function resource was created by customer.

parameters.name: vendorName
parameters.description: The name of the vendor.

parameters.name: serviceKey
parameters.description: The GUID for the vendor virtual network function.

parameters.name: roleInstanceNames
parameters.description: A list of role instance names of a virtual network function. Omitting the role instance names will result in getting the operational state of all role instances of the virtual network function.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Lists all the vendor virtual network function sub resources in an Azure region, filtered by skuType, skuName, vendorProvisioningState.

parameters.name: locationName
parameters.description: The Azure region where the virtual network function resource was created by the customer.

parameters.name: vendorName
parameters.description: The name of the vendor.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The filter to apply on the operation. The properties you can use for eq (equals) are: skuType, skuName and vendorProvisioningState.

200.description: Request is successful. The operation returns the resulting hybrid network vendor virtual network function sub resource.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

value.description: A list of vendor virtual network functions.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

VendorVirtualNetworkFunctionListResult.description: Response for vendors API service call.

VendorVirtualNetworkFunction.description: Vendor virtual network function sub resource.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the vendor virtual network function sub resource.

vendorProvisioningState.description: The vendor controlled provisioning state of the vendor virtual network function.

virtualNetworkFunctionVendorConfiguratio.description: An array of virtual network function vendor configurations.

roleName.description: The name of the vendor virtual network function role.

osProfile.description: Specifies the operating system settings for the role instance.

userDataParameters.description: The user parameters from the customer.

VirtualNetworkFunctionRoleInstanceNames.description: Specifies a list of role instance names of the vendor virtual network function.

VirtualNetworkFunctionRoleInstanceList.description: List of role instances of vendor virtual network function.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

operationalState.description: The operational state of the role instance.

RoleInstanceProperties.description: The role instance properties of the virtual network function.
